overview: JACK, PAK, and KI (Camera) spend two days and one night together in a building owned by JACK's father on the second floor in Taipei, to commemorate the Chinese New Year. The resulting film is a personal record of everyday life inspired by Jonas Mekas' diary films. The selection of sound was made first, followed by the corresponding image, resulting in the presentation of independent sounds and images rather than sound supporting the images.
title: TAIPEI-DURÉE
